page.title: 15LEISURE ACTIVITIES - SURVEY
page.content:
{Under 11 years of age. 58.6% were members of a Youth Club. 10% were members of the Judo Club 6.9% were members of the Karate Club 6.9% regularly visited a swimming pool 17% were Cubs or Brownies 6.9% were members of a Rugby Club 6.9% were members of a Cricket Club 13.8% were members of a Golf Club 13.8% took part in church social activities {12 to 18 years of age} 67% were members of a Youth Club 8% were members of a Cricket Club 8% were members of a Golf Club 8% took part in church social activities 92% regularly visited a swimming pool
{Continued on page 16
